ygData.subject: RE: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: Not all of us live in the U.S. either, and don t celebrate thanksgiving on this date. Elywn Heartstring Level 50 Bard Erollsi Marr ... From: Daniel P.
ygData.messageBody:
Not all of us live in the U.S. either, and don't celebrate thanksgiving on
this date.


Elywn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard
Erollsi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 2:50 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gnomestock '99


From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>

I think a lot of people get the day after Thanksgiving off (I'm
self-employed so...)

However when I wasn't self-employed - I worked for a Mutual Fund Company -
and our holiday days were determined when the New York Stock Exchange was
closed. The day after Thanksgiving is NOT a market holiday - so I had to
work..

Slyde
